titleStmt.title: The midship-man's garland Containing three new songs. 1st. A new dialogue call'd, Billy, the midship-man's welcome home to his sweet-heart Molly. 2d. The traders medley: or the cry's of London. 3d. Admiral Russel's scowering the French fleet: or, the battle at sea.

The midship-man's garland Containing three new songs. 1st. A new dialogue call'd, Billy, the midship-man's welcome home to his sweet-heart Molly. 2d. The traders medley: or the cry's of London. 3d. Admiral Russel's scowering the French fleet: or, the battle at sea.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Walter, at the Hand and Pen in high Holbourn,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Plomer; date of publication from Wing.
At end of text: Licensed according to order.
Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) M2002 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2124.4.
Wing incorrectly describes this work as being a broadsheet and the title as "midshipman's".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
